title: ISO 8601-1:2019 Recurring Time Interval by Start and End (Ordinal Date, Basic Format)
description: A recurring time interval identified by its start and end, using ordinal date combined with complete local time of day in basic format ["R"][n]["/"][YYYY][DDD]["T"][hh][mm][ss]["/"][YYYY][DDD]["T"][hh][mm][ss] (§5.6.3 a, §5.5.3.4 a, §5.5.3.1 a)
$comment: The recurrence number [n] is optional (§5.6.1). When absent, the number of occurrences is unbounded. Day 366 is accepted for any year, and leap year validation must be performed by the consumer. Time shifts (§5.5.3.4 b) are not supported
